channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Northern Lights Alert: Where And When To See Aurora This Weekend
item.description: The Northern Lights (aurora borealis may be seen in the continental U.S. after space weather forecasters predicted favorable geomagnetic storm conditi...

item.title: Getting AI to do your work
item.description: That’s the first step, certainly. If you don’t, your boss will. The second step is to take the time you’ve freed up and do work that the AI can’t do.

item.title: Google Reveals New Low-Cost Storage For Google Photos, Drive And Gmail
item.description: Google has begun offering a new, considerably less expensive entry-level tier for its Google One subscription service, called Google One Lite.

item.title: Better pockets
item.description: Every coat needs better pockets. There are categories of products or services where there’s a universal area for improvement. When in doubt, make the ...

item.title: How Quantum Networks Create A Secure And Sustainable Communication Infrastructure
item.description: As we move toward a quantum future, we need to prioritize business communications that are fast, secure and energy-efficient.

item.title: When did we lose consciousness?
item.description: In medical TV dramas, losing consciousness is something that happens suddenly and dramatically. We can all tell… the body is still there, but the mind...

item.title: AI Can’t Replace Creativity, But Certainly Can Enhance It
item.description: The top skill sought by hiring managers: creativity. Where does AI stand?

item.title: The Tightrope Of Adopting AI Without Sacrificing Employee Self-Worth
item.description: 2024 is the year organizations truly began using—and deriving business value from AI. And we know that AI will continue to grow in popularity.

item.title: A labor of love
